patthana15.23:1.1: Sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.23:2.1: Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.23:3.1: Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
